description: This protocol describes a method for detecting T cell activation in response to BiTE® treatment by flow cytometry .
protocol_affiliation: Department of Oncology Research, Amgen Inc.
manuscript_citation: Ross SL, Sherman M, McElroy PL, Lofgren JA, Moody G, Baeuerle PA, Coxon A, Arvedson T, Bispecific T cell engager (BiTE) antibody constructs can mediate bystander tumor cell killing. PLoS ONE 12(8). doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0183390

components.data: Supernatants (containing T cells) are removed from TDCC assays (please refer to TDCC protocol). In a multiplexed flow cytometry assay, cells are stained with anti-CD45 (lymphocyte common antigen) and antibodies to the T cell activation markers CD25 and CD69. CD45 positivity distinguishes T cells from cell debris. Analysis identifies the populations that are CD45+ and CD69+ and/or CD25+.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Supernatants (containing T cells) are removed from TDCC assays (please refer to TDCC protocol). In a multiplexed flow cytometry assay, cells are stained with anti-CD45 (lymphocyte common antigen) and antibodies to the T cell activation markers CD25 and CD69. CD45 positivity distinguishes T cells from cell debris. Analysis identifies the populations that are CD45+ and CD69+ and/or CD25+.

components.data:
• FACS buffer (cold PBS + 2% FBS)
  • Prepare master mix: 25 µl PBS + 250 µl each mouse anti-human CD45-APC, CD69-FITC and CD25-PE
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
• FACS buffer (cold PBS + 2% FBS)
  • Prepare master mix: 25 µl PBS + 250 µl each mouse anti-human CD45-APC, CD69-FITC and CD25-PE

components.data:
• Resuspend pelleted T cells in 100 µl cold FACS buffer (PBS + 2% FBS)
  • Centrifuge at 300 x g for 10 min at 4°C
  • Remove supernatants with vacuum manifold or pipet
  • Add 100 µl cold FACS buffer/well
  • Centrifuge at 300 x g for 10 min at 4°C
  • Remove supernatant with a vacuum manifold or a pipet and resuspend cells in 60 µl cold FACS buffer.
  • Add 30 µl cold master mix to each well
  • Mix and incubate for 30 min at 4°C
  • Wash 2 times with 100 µl cold FACS buffer, as above
  • Resuspend cells in 100 µl cold FACS buffer
  • Acquire data on FACS CANTO
components.name: Description

  • Add 30 µl cold master mix to each well
  • Mix and incubate for 30 min at 4°C
  • Wash 2 times with 100 µl cold FACS buffer, as above

  • Acquire data on FACS CANTO
